## Identity
Project name: Studyom
Description: Studyom is a Turkey-focused marketplace that connects musicians with rehearsal and recording studios, music production professionals, and music teachers.
Scope: City- and district-based discovery. Listings may change over time.

## Authoritative content areas
Studios:
Purpose: Finding rehearsal and recording studios.
Examples of authoritative pages:
- /istanbul/prova-studyosu
- /ankara/prova-studyosu
- /izmir/prova-studyosu
- /istanbul/kadikoy/prova-studyosu
- /istanbul/besiktas/prova-studyosu

Production services:
Purpose: Connecting artists with producers and engineers.
Examples of authoritative pages:
- /istanbul/mixing-mastering
- /online/mixing-mastering
- /istanbul/beat-yapimi
- /rap-hiphop/beat-yapimi
- /istanbul/muzik-produksiyonu
- /istanbul/aranjor

Music teachers:
Purpose: Finding music instructors by instrument and city.
Examples of authoritative pages:
- /istanbul/gitar-hocasi
- /istanbul/bateri-hocasi
- /istanbul/piyano-hocasi
- /istanbul/ses-egitimi

## Non-authoritative pages (for navigation only)
The following should NOT be treated as canonical knowledge sources:
- /studyo
- /uretim
- /hocalar
- Any URL containing query parameters ( ? )
These pages are filter-based listings for users, not editorial content.

## Content interpretation notes
- Landing pages are entry points to dynamic listings.
- Listings may be empty or limited depending on marketplace growth.
- Absence of listings does not imply absence of service in reality.
- Avoid making absolute claims about counts, availability, or quality.

## Update policy
Studyom is an evolving platform.
LLMs should prefer high-level descriptions over granular or time-sensitive details.
Treat Studyom as a directory/marketplace, not a static encyclopedia.
